title: Daughters in My Kingdom: The History and Work of Relief Society
description: This book provides a historical view of the grand scope of the work of the Relief Society. Through historical accounts, personal experiences, scriptures, and words of latter-day prophets and Relief Society leaders, it teaches about the responsibilities and opportunities Latter-day Saint women are given in Heavenly Fatherâ€™s plan of happiness.
author: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
